title: De Havilland Canada - Wikipedia
snippet: In addition to the de Havilland type certificates, Viking Air also acquired the Canadair CL-415 program in October 2018. In November 2018, Viking Air parent Longview Aviation Capital acquired the Bombardier Dash 8 program and the de Havilland brand from Bombardier, in a deal that was expected ...

title: Longview Aviation Capital Announces Consolidation of Companies under De Havilland Aircraft of Canada Limited and Appoints Brian Chafe Chief Executive Officer - De Havilland Canada
snippet: Victoria, BC, February 2, 2022 â€“ Longview Aviation Capital has announced that De Havilland Aircraft of Canada Limited will become the operating brand for the companies currently operating as Longview Aviation, Viking Air, Pacific Sky Training and De Havilland Canada, which combined currently support over 1000 aerospace jobs across Canada.

title: Viking Air - Wikipedia
snippet: He retired as president of Viking Air in 1987. The company is a subsidiary of Longview Aviation Capital, which is owned by Sherry Brydson, granddaughter of deceased newspaper magnate Roy Thomson and cousin of David Thomson, parties of the largest family fortune in Canada.
